channel.title: !Hamachi!
channel.description:
[b][u]Hello and welcome to my thread about HAMACHI[/u][/b]
[b]I have a simple question. When I try to connect to my Hamachi, the status will change to 'connected'. Although it won't show all the servers I've joined to etc. Then about 10 minutes later it will start reconnecting. I tried to reboot my computer, this only works 20% of the time. I wan't to figure this out to prevent it from happening in the future.
What it says exactly is this : [u]Connection to the mediation server bibi.hamachi.cc has been unexpectedly lost. Would you like to reconnect?[/u]
Even when you try to reconnect it won't, it will just stay 'reconnecting' hours and hours on end.
To clarify, I want to know how to connect to my Hamachi, PROPERLY. Thank-you.[/b]
Moderators. Please tell me if this is in the wrong section, I have it posted in the MoparScape Questions section also, I just put it here for more input. If it [i]is[/i] in the wrong section, I will simply remove it.
Thanks.

item.title: !Hamachi!
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Hello and welcome to my thread about HAMACHI

[b]I have a simple question. When I try to connect to my Hamachi, the status will change to ‘connected’. Although it won’t show all the servers I’ve joined to etc. Then about 10 minutes later it will start reconnecting. I tried to reboot my computer, this only works 20% of the time. I wan’t to figure this out to prevent it from happening in the future.

What it says exactly is this : Connection to the mediation server bibi.hamachi.cc has been unexpectedly lost. Would you like to reconnect?

Even when you try to reconnect it won’t, it will just stay ‘reconnecting’ hours and hours on end.

To clarify, I want to know how to connect to my Hamachi, PROPERLY.
Thank-you.[/b]

Moderators. Please tell me if this is in the wrong section, I have it posted in the MoparScape Questions section also, I just put it here for more input. If it is in the wrong section, I will simply remove it.

Thanks.
